other_tests.findings: Mild oedema of the ascending colon and caecum
Postponed due to resolving symptoms and abnormalities
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up CT scan done 72 hours later showed complete resolution of the abnormalities

other_tests.findings: Reduced total haemolytic complement activity (CH50), C1 inhibitor, and C4; normal concentrations of C3 and Clq
other_tests.changes_over_time: Final diagnosis of hereditary angioedema type 1 made
